Description:
The Perfect Start
In this golden pocket of Derrimut we have a home you will want to be yours. Perfect for first home buyers, growing family or investors. Consisting of 4 bedrooms including a master with en-suite and walk in robe. A large open plan living area with adjoining meals area, bright kitchen with loads of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances, main bathroom and separate laundry. Walk out to a low maintenance rear yard perfect for entertaining all year round. Situated close to local park, Derrimut village shopping centre, recreational facilities, restaurants and a short drive to the western ring road giving easy access to the CBD.
This home includes:
- Four good size bedrooms
- Master with WIR and full ensuite.
- Huge living area with dining/meals arrangements adjoining to the kitchen.
- Two bathrooms.
- Decent size practical kitchen with enough cupboard space, pantry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher etc.
- Ducted heating and split air conditioning.
- Laundry with enough space.
- Double remote garage with internal access to home and external excess to backyard.
Insights: 6 Sherrington Grange, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
A True Family Home On 704m2 Land
Stop and look no further as this gorgeous 4 bedroom home offers you endless opportunity. This high-end abode offers three living areas which include a front formal lounge, family retreat plus a sun filled rumpus room allowing everyone to have their own sense of space and privacy.
The centrally located kitchen offers a huge amount of bench and cupboard space accompanied by quality stainless steel cooking appliances. With open plan living in mind, the kitchen overlooks 2 living retreats plus a massive dining area providing enough room to house a large setting.
Entertain all year round under your alfresco living area overlooking a massive yard that allows you to have loads of potential.
Do you need easy access to your backyard for boats, caravans, trailers or more? 3 Tantallon Crescent can offer you that and more.
Quality furnishings and fittings included are ducted heating, high ceilings, floor boards throughout the home, double car garage, stainless steel cooking appliances and loads more.
Situated in the popular Brimbank Gardens Estate, the home is a stones throw away from schools, parks, public transport, Sunshine Golf Club, restaraunts and Derrimut Village Shopping Centre.
Insights: 3 Tantallon Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Great street appeal, presents like new and still under warranty, 4 large bedrooms including luxurious master suite with dual WIR's, two sleek bathrooms, sensational modern kitchen with WIP, 2 large living areas including theatre room and amazing outside areas that will blow you away. Hopefully all these short points have intrigued you enough to attend one of the open houses, if not then allow me one last chance to strongly recommend you inspect this special property. Bring your tick sheet along as this home will most certainly tick all the boxes. Please note full list of special features provided upon inspection.

Description:
Everything for Today's Modern Lifestyle
From the striking facade through to the ultra-modern interior, every inch of this near new home has been meticulously crafted to showcase the very best in living and entertaining. Inside, you'll discover an open-plan living space overseen by a quality kitchen equipped with stainless-steel appliances, stone benches and glass splashbacks. On the upper level, the luxurious master enjoys the comforts of a large walk-in robe, ensuite and balcony access while the second bedroom and study are serviced by an immaculate central bathroom. Outdoors, the decked alfresco is surrounded by a low maintenance garden offering ample space for relaxation or entertaining. High-end fittings and fixtures feature throughout including ducted heating, split system cooling, high ceilings, plantation shutters and single car garage with internal access. Set in a boutique complex and located within a stone's throw to St Lawrence Primary School, Balmoral Park and Derrimut Village Shopping Centre, it's the perfect option for a young couple, downsizer, or a fuss-free addition to any investment portfolio.
Insights: 2/100 Capesthorne Drive, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Providing that indoor/ outdoor living we all love in a modern home, this lovely Derrimut residence is highlighted by wonderful outdoor spaces featuring a great sized rear yard, built in BBQ with decked seating and a fantastic alfresco area that provides year round comfort as it can be opened up or closed off depending on the weather. Inside has been beautifully maintained and comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, the master at the rear of the property with huge WIR and ensuite. A large kitchen featuring 900mm appliances overlooks the dining and family room that leads to outside whilst another large space situated at the front of property can be used as a kids rumpus area, formal lounge or 2nd living space or converted into a 4th bedroom. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, high ceilings, electric roller shutters, storage shed, downlights, landscaped front and rear gardens and double remote garage with internal access. The opportunity to secure a home you will look forward to coming home to every day awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
Attention All Investors and First Home Buyers
Situated in one of Derrimut's finest pockets and within a short distance to public transport, schools, parkland and easy access to Western Freeway is this stunning home. Boasting formal lounge leading to the hub of the home featuring a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the dining/family area. The generous sized bedrooms with B.I.R's (master with a full en-suite and W.I.R.) are serviced by a central sparkling bathroom. Further complementing the home is a double remote garage, high ceiling, downlights throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and stone bench top. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
High Quality Luxury Living
With the desirable blend of design, lifestyle and location, this incredible home offers a living experience like no other, within minutes from Derrimut Village, medical centres, gymnasiums, restaurants & cafes. The clever design draws from the best of classic and modern architecture to highlight its welcoming façade and low maintenance characteristics. The double door entrance leads you into a spacious open living for the whole family to enjoy. With polished concrete floors, high ceilings, stone benchtops and lots of natural light. Outside, a fabulous entertaining area, overlooking a private backyard. Beyond this, the homes meticulous interior showcases three bedrooms, all with built in robes. The master with an ensuite, and additional central bathroom, both with sleek design and floor-to-ceiling tiles. The home comes fully equipped with multiple split system heating/cooling units, remote garage, cctv cameras and intercom. This is one opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Prepare To Be Mesmerized...
It's not too often you walk up a driveway and go, WOW, let alone open the front door and have the wow continue all the way until the end. A stunning 4 bedroom plus study Porter Davis Bridgeport 35 brilliant floor plan, with every possible extra helping complete what can only be described as a masterpiece.
On entry, this glorious home boasts a large and welcoming wide entrance with high ceilings. Double doors take you to the massive master bedroom suite with bonus parents retreat, generously sized his & hers WIR's, an ensuite with oversized shower, stone bench tops, feature tiles and twin vanities. The genius floor plan also features three large bedrooms, a sparkling central bathroom and a large study positioned off the entry hall for those who need to study or work from home.
The central fully equipped kitchen is a real masterpiece and is most ideal for the chef of the home to cook up a treat, featuring stone benchtops breakfast bar with double sink, dishwasher, 900mm stainless stove, ample bench, cupboard and storage space including a superb walk-in pantry; all overlooking the family room and dining space that is equally impressive.
There are 3 separate living zones that are cleverly designed to please the entire family and include a front lounge/sitting room - suited for quiet time and relaxation. The combined casual family room and meals area look out through an array of windows with timber bi-folds opening out to the magnificent decked alfresco outdoor area; such a wonderful space for family gatherings and enjoyment. Set at the rear of the home is the rumpus room/formal dining leading to a peaceful and private second entertainment area and direct access to the backyard.
Venturing outside, both stunning alfresco decking areas will lead you to a low maintenance backyard with widespread lush green lawns giving plenty of grassed area for the kids and 4 legged pets to play.
This home is a standout in a premium location that you can expect to fall in love with. Your family can relish and enjoy Derrimut's finest schools and parks all within minutes and the convenience of easy access to the Western Ring Road. Call for more information on how you can secure this substantial family home for yourself, or see you at the Open Home!
*PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS*

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
With everything already done for you, just move in and enjoy all the extras and options that this lovely Derrimut residence offers. With a flexible floorplan the home currently offers four (4 ) bedrooms, but for those that prefer extra living space, the bedroom at the front of the property can easily be converted into a formal sitting area or the one at the rear can be transformed into an amazing theatre or kids rumpus room. An enormous central kitchen featuring stone benches and 900mm appliances overlooks the expansive dining and main living space that leads outside to a great undercover entertainment area and rear yard featuring extensive exposed aggregate concreting and artificial grass. Two (2) sleek modern bathrooms and a double remote garage with internal access complete the property. A host of extra features include ducted heating, split system cooling, alarm, security cameras, electric roller shutters, front fence, tinted windows and gorgeous low maintenance gardens leaving more time for you to relax and enjoy this beautifully presented and maintained home. An opportunity to purchase this absolute gem awaits one lucky purchaser.
Insights: 23 Manderston Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
How many times do you find yourself at work drifting off and thinking of your next holiday destination? Do you picture yourself relaxing on a hammock in some tropical paradise surrounded by palm trees, reading your favourite magazine or book and enjoying a quiet drink whilst soaking up those rays? Oh what bliss!! Only a few months till my annual leave you tell yourself. Well why wait? Presented to you here is not only an opportunity to secure a luxurious Porter Davis residence, but one where you can return home from work every day of the year to relax and immerse yourself in the wonderful surrounds of your very own backyard oasis as this property's rear yard can only be described as something special. Just as good inside as out, this beautifully maintained and presented abode comprises 3 generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite and a large separate study that can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom. Open plan in design the huge kitchen with WIP overlooks the expansive dining and living area that spills out to the huge decked alfresco forming that indoor/outdoor entertaining zone we all love whilst the magnificent theatre room provides the perfect space to lock yourself away from the world and enjoy your favourite movie. The home you have always dreamed of, the only one you have ever really wanted is finally on the market. Please note full list of features will be provided upon inspection.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
This brilliant owner built residence ( approx. 29 squares ) is highlighted by the most magnificent outdoor entertainment area you will find comprising of a huge deck that provides the perfect setting for all occasions in the tranquility and peaceful surrounds of lovely gardens and feature bamboo fencing. With two zones you have the choice of relaxing with a drink on the outdoor couches, alfresco dining on those warm summer evenings or utilise the entire space when hosting the largest of family gatherings. Moving inside you are greeted with an impressive kitchen featuring thick stone benches, mosaic splashback and stainless steel appliances that overlooks the dining and main living area. Sleeping quarters comprise 4 large bedrooms, the master with huge WIR and oversize shower ensuite and the remaining 3 bedrooms with mirrored BIR's serviced by a sleek, modern central bathroom. A separate formal lounge room or open study at the front of the property and a huge rumpus or theatre room to the rear provide versatility and add to the living and entertaining spaces of the home whilst the large laundry and double remote garage with internal access complete the home. Other features include soaring high ceilings, modern contemporary flooring, stone benches in kitchen and bathrooms, high custom doors throughout, downlights, square set plastering, alarm, floor to ceiling tiles in bathrooms, ducted heating, split system cooling and landscaped front and rear gardens are but a few of the standout features that come with this wonderful home. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate exactly what is on offer.
Insights: 41 Grosvenor Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT
Located on a quiet no through road, directly in front of parkland and literally a few steps from the vibrant Derrimut village, this lovely property combines impressive spaces with the ultimate lifestyle location. Sleeping quarters comprise 3 spacious bedrooms, the master with WIR and ensuite and 2 additional bedrooms with BIR's serviced by the central main bathroom. A large kitchen overlooks the dining and main living space that leads you outside to a lovely low maintenance paved outdoor entertainment area and rear yard. Other features include ducted heating, cooling and double remote garage with internal access. A lifestyle of just popping out your front door for a coffee or meal at your favourite café or restaurant, a little shopping or a workout and swim at the local leisure centre and the total convenience of being walking distance to the Deer Park train station or easy access to freeway for your commute to the city awaits.

Description:
Auction This Thursday @7:30pm
Rarely a property comes in the market so beautiful and spacious that will win your heart the moment you step in. Welcome to 30 Lincoln Drive Derrimut. This Porter Davis prestige property was built with the family in mind. Comprising of 4 luxury bedrooms (Master with parents retreat and walk in robe) and 2 hotel style bathrooms alongside a abundance of formal and informal living zones. Enter the hub of the home where the MasterChef kitchen stands and is large enough to feed an army of guests. If you are a social butterfly then look no further as you can increase you entertaining space exponentially by opening the bi-fold doors and take in the Balinese themed garden. To complete the picture, the backyard makes you feel like you're on holiday 365 days a year with a solar heated pool and Bali hut to soak in the afternoon sun. A host of inclusions accompany this fine property and will be supplied on inspection. Land Size 756sm approx. Don't delay, Inspect today.

Description:
Grand scale living with unparalleled luxury
Every now and then, a home comes up for sale that represents precisely the type of upgrade you have been waiting for. Innovative and inspiring, this Porter Davis Marriott 44 home offers gallery like fluidity across two levels in Derrimut's most prestigious pocket. Forward thinking interiors offer functional family living, surrounded by private, low maintenance gardens and has resulted in this breathtaking luxury domain that is as much a modern architectural masterpiece as it is a comfortable and functional family home.
With an Ensuite and walk-in-robe to each of the 4 bedrooms, a palatial master bedroom, and a romantic Juliette balcony beyond the children's retreat, it's hard to imagine a more refined residence and lifestyle for the family. Wide double door grand entrance lobby leads you through to the expansive lounge, dining room and family rooms, that beautifully connects with the outdoor alfresco area promising endless entertainment all year around.
Creative cooks will relish a hostess kitchen that gives you not just a stone bench kitchen with modern appliances, but both a walk-in storage and a butler's pantry to use as work stations for guest catering. A home theatre/ guest 5th bedroom at the rear of the home is for the ultimate cinema experience at home or a downstairs bedroom option.
Parents will appreciate the luxury of space in the master bedroom, the inclusion of a hot spa bathtub an extra-large shower in the Ensuite, and the extravagance of a tranquil terrace overlooking the backyard - just the spot for idyllic relaxation.
A double remote garage, large study, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, low maintenance yards with kids playground and stunning water feature, electric front gate are just a few of the quality inclusions on offer.
There's simply too much to mention in words and the rest you can admire for yourself on a walk through as you realize a regal façade is just the beginning of this benchmark property set within a short walk to Derrimut's finest schools and public transport. Contemporary home design doesn't get much finer than this proud exclusive home.
Make this family home yours today!
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Look No Further!
Located minutes from parks, schools, Derrimut Village Shopping Centre and easy access to the Western Freeway, this brick veneer home will appeal to astute investors and first home buyers.
Positioned in a quiet pocket of Derrimut, this property showcases 4 good sized bedrooms (all with BIR, including master with full ensuite), formal lounge room, well designed kitchen with adjoining dining and rumpus room, central bathroom, ducted heating throughout, motorized garage with access to backyard and an undercover veranda perfect for outdoor entertainment.

Description:
Spacious interiors and perfectly positioned
This gorgeous four-bedroom home is a perfect sanctuary for any growing family. Set on a generous block in a quiet street of the lovely and family orientated suburb of Derrimut and only a stone's throw away from parks, schools, freeway access and shops. Comprising a large formal lounge, spacious modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances adjoining the meals and family area and leading to the beautiful undercover entertaining area. With four great size bedrooms all with BIRs, master with an ensuite, separate study, sparkling central bathroom this home proves there is ample room for everyone. Other features include double car garage with remote control and internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling, stone benchtops and much more. Don't miss out and call us today for an inspection.

Description:
Perfect First Home or Investment!
Ideal for first home buyers, empty nesters and investors alike this well maintained property offers a flowing floor plan that caters for modern family living. Stylish interiors plus a generous block size enhance family appeal. Be quick not to miss this opportunity to secure your own piece of Derrimut.
*Four bedroom and two bathrooms. Main bedroom includes walk in robe and en suite bathroom.
*Spacious sun filled open plan living incorporates a modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, stone bench with breakfast bar, ample storage and work space including pantry, adjoining dining and living room. Additional formal lounge provides entertaining flexibility.
*The rear garden setting provides the avid gardener plenty of scope for upgrading landscaping to create an appealing garden setting.
*Features include split system air conditioner, double garage with internal access, contemporary interiors including neutral colour scheme, quality fixtures and fittings, window coverings, down lights, quality tiling, stone benches, ample storage
This perfectly positioned family home is located within easy access of shopping centre freeway, local parks, medical centre and so much more. Convenience is yours!

Description:
Five Star Living.
World class Wow factors abound throughout this Stunning Porter Davis home with top quality finishes and first-class workmanship. Situated in one of Derrimut's best locations this home will tick all the boxes.
With a Flexible floor plan that allows the family to choose to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy, this home comprises 3 bedrooms plus study/4th bedroom (master with Ensuite and walk in robe), a large theatre/rumpus room, an open kitchen, meals and family area that connects to the manicured back yard and the outdoor entertainment area. This beautiful home also features a sparkling central bathroom, laundry and a double car garage with remote control access.
Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling plus additional split system, alarm system, blackbutt solid timber floors, stone benchtop, massive walk in pantry and much, much more for years of comfortable living.
Call in today to inspect.
